name: Chris Tomlin
description: '''Christopher Dwayne Tomlin''' (born May 4, 1972) is an American [[contemporary Christian music]] singer, songwriter, and [[worship leader]] from [[Grand Saline, Texas]]. He is signed to [[Universal Music Group|Universal]]'s [[Capitol Christian Music Group]]. Some of his most well-known songs are "[[How Great Is Our God (song)|How Great Is Our God]]", "[[Our God (song)|Our God]]", "[[Whom Shall I Fear (God of Angel Armies)]]" and "[[Holy Forever]]".
